entry.title: Happy Valentines Day Sms 2014
entry.content:
best Happy Valentines Day Sms 2014

Short but Effective…
(((((
“I love ….. loving you..
)))))
Happy Valentine’s day!”

best Happy Valentines Day Sms 2014

**Happy Valentines Day Sms 2014**

Kal tak jo ajnabi thi,aaj who mere pass aa gayi,
Ankho ke rashte who mere dil mein sama gayi,
Ankhe hai uski jheel ki tarah gaheri,
Hoto pe uske ek payari se muskan hai,
Sadhgi mein jeena aadat hai uski,
Who koi aur nahi-Who koi aur nahi….
who tho ab meri jaan hai,
Bin kuch bole sab kuch kahe jati hai,
Ye hume pata hai ki who hume kitna chati hai,
Who koi aur nahi-Who koi aur nahi,
Who tho ab meri jaan hai…
____________________________________
